tgt_original: om bhūḥ khamiti mantreṇa viyadbhūtāṃ vasundharām |
hū la hū iti vajrātmakṣmāṃ kṛtvā tāmadhiṣṭhayet ||148 ||
datvā balyarghamāpūjya homairāpyāyya khe nyaset |  khānayet kṣmāṃ sunirvighnāṃ garttāpūre'pyayaṃ kramaḥ ||145 ||

ācīrṇapūrvasaṃsevo mañjuvajrātmayogavān |  saṃskṛtya maṇḍalasthānaṃ sahāyaiḥ pūjayānvitaḥ ||146 ||  vighnāricakrayogasthaḥ svābhiṣekaṃ samādadet |  duṣṭānnikṛntayedevaṃ yogādvā svādhidaivatāt ||147 ||
om gha gha ghātaya ghātaya sarvaduṣṭān phaṭ kīlaya kīlaya sarvapāpān phaṭ hū hū hū vajra kīla[ya] vajradhara ājñāpayati kāyavākcittavajra kīlaya hū phaṭ |
vighnaughān ghātayet sarvān daśadiksaṃvyavasthitān ||163 ||  saṃvīkṣya kṣmāṃ sunirvighnāṃ tīkṣṇajvālākulaprabhām |
kṣmāṃ saṃlipya sugandhādyaiścitraiḥ puṣpaiḥ prakīrya ca |
candrādyaiścakriṇāṃ sthāne prakuryānmaṇḍalaṃ budhaḥ ||167 ||  tatrāvāhya tu sa ca(cca)
dhūpādhivāsitaṃ tatra sadgandhādyabjabhājanam ||171 ||  pratidinaṃ trisandhyāsu baliṃ datvā tathā japet |
kulino guṇinaḥ śrāddhānrūpavarṇavayo'nvitān ||182 ||  arthinaścābhiyuktāṃśca saugatānmantrasādhane |  virūpānnirguṇāṃścāpi hīnānapyadhivāsayet ||183 ||
puṇyakāmāstato'nye ca paralokārthino'pare ||185 ||  praviśenmaṇḍalaṃ dhīmānnaihikaṃ phalamīhayet ||186 ||
pañcāmṛtasugandhena temayitvātha rakṣitam ||221 ||  tryakṣarāntargataṃ yogī valayet sūtradhāriṇā |
trijjaḥ kāraistamāpreṣya jjaḥ jjaḥ jjaḥ ityapi svayaṃ punaḥ ||222 ||
śvetaṃ pītaṃ tathā raktaṃ haritaṃ kṛṣṇameva ca |
samapradakṣiṇācchinnāvakrāṃ rekhā prapātayet ||244 ||  samāṃ ca pātayedrekhāṃ dvāraviśatibhāgikām |
śvetavajramayī sūcī sauvarṇālambanāparā |  padmarāgamayī sūcī tathā marakatāparā ||247 ||  kṛṣṇābhyantarato jñeyā eṣa raṅgakramo'sya tu |
tattvena siddha me bhagavan mahārāgo mahārata ||284 ||
pure śiṣyapraveśārthaṃ tattvaṃ satyaṃ ca śrāvayet ||281 ||
tena satyena me nātha kāmāṃstvaṃ paripūraya ||288 ||  pratibimbasamā dharmā acchāḥ suddhā hyanāvilāḥ |
tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryaṃ vajrapāṇi dṛḍhavratam ||313 ||
tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryā bodhiragrā jinairmatā |
om sarvatathāgatasiddhivajrasamaye tiṣṭha eṣa tvāṃ dhārayāmi hīḥ hi hi hi hi hū |
maṇḍalaṃ devatātattvamācāryaparikarma ca |  saṃkathya guhyaprajñābhyāṃ siktvā tattvaṃ samuddiśet ||367 ||
yadāha-  na tathā bodhicaryādyairanyai rvāpi nayaiḥ śubhaiḥ |  prāpyante sarvabuddhādyā yathābhiṣekādito nayāt ||368 ||
